name: Govind Vihar Residential Scheme
summary: Residential plots available under the Govind Vihar scheme. Affordable pricing, clear titles, and easy access to main roads.

name: Shastri Nagar Housing Scheme
summary: Premium housing plots designed for modern living with parks, schools, and hospitals nearby.

name: Green Valley Residential Scheme
summary: Environment-friendly residential plots with greenery and proper waste management facilities.
